column2: Might take a few minutes for the first time.

Basic survival skill.Including fishing, planting, gathering materials.
Cook more delicious and nutritious food.
Skills of creating. Crafting tools, weapons, protection.
Skills of sailing, navigation and mapping.
Skills of fighting. Increase strength, speed, use of weapons and battle technic.
Each finished trial would provide additional bonus when upgraded to next level.
If survior are too hungery, thirsty, or insanity (UI turn red), he/she would start to lose health.
Care influence the skill of healing wound and caring patient.
Unlock randomly when survivors have an "aha moment".
You need to restart the game to make the settings take effect.

Press LAlt to show tooltips.
LMB/RMB to manage storage amount.
Hold LCtrl and left click item to cancel.
Mod requires restart to take effect, do you want to restart now?

{0}is dehydrated and start to lose health.

You've just run out of precious wood! 
When wood is run out, you could demolish buildings which are not needed anymore, or just keep waiting, to see what will happen on sea.
Since it's guide here, you will get some wood as a gift immediately! 
It will not appear when it is a real game.
Build a tree to get more wood soon!
I feel nothing about it now.
How did I think before for that thing.
I like it for a long time, long for it.
It's worth changing my mind for it.
Something happens in my mind, I want it much.
I have it, but I don't care.
Finally, I have something which I like.
I have but I don't like it.
Finally, I have what I dream of.
I used to have it, but I didn't cherish.
